data.title: Rhino Poachers Shot Dead by Forest Guards in India

Chinese Farmers Revolt Against Govt Land Grab - Demand free elections, saying their chief sent thugs to attack the community. The road that runs along Shangpu is littered with burned-out cars. Farmers have built tents & barricades. Police have been in standoff 2 weeks.
